# Summary

A concise summary of the main claim or concept. Use @citationkey to cite sources (e.g., @Smith2024), which will appear as superscript numbers [1].

# Details

Detailed explanation of the concept, including:

- Key mechanisms @citationkey
- Evidence and reasoning @citationkey
- Conditions and context
- Limitations or caveats

When citing sources, use the @ symbol followed by the citation key from bibliography.bib. Multiple citations in sequence will appear as [1-3] and separate citations as [1, 5].
